import React from 'react' import Profile from './../img/profileImg.jpg' import './PostShare.css' import {UilScenery} from '@iconscout/react-unicons' import {UilPlayCircle} from '@iconscout/react-unicons' import {UilLocationPoint} from '@iconscout/react-unicons' import {UilSchedule} from '@iconscout/react-unicons' import {useState, useRef } from 'react' const PostShare = () => { const [Image, setImage]= useState(null) const imageRef =useRef(); const onImageChange=(event)=>{ if(event.target.files && event.target.files[0]){ let img= event.target.files[0] setImage() } } return (
Photo
Video
Location
Schedule
) } export default PostShare
